channel.title: On Rail Crash
channel.description: As I'm going through some tunnels a loading phase begins as I enter the next area on the map bm_c2a2c. As soon as the loading is complete, my game crashes down and I have to ctrl+alt+dlt to exit the game. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_21T14_25_3C0.mdmp (73.8 KB)
